attributes.title: How Ahmisa (Non-Violence) Can Be The Strategy To Stop The Hindu Holocaust!
attributes.description:
5 MAY 2020 

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE FROM KAILASA:

*AHIMSA PARAMO DHARMAHA - THE ULTIMATE COSMIC LAW. DHARMA MEANS ‘COSMIC LAW’. THE ULTIMATE COSMIC LAW IS ‘AHIMSA’ - NONVIOLENCE. IT IS THE MOST POWERFUL, BEST STRATEGY, EVEN TO STOP THE HINDU HOLOCAUST.

*I TALK AFTER THOROUGHLY TUNING MYSELF TO PARAMASHIVA. LITERALLY PARAMASHIVA IS UTTERING EVERY WORD I AM UTTERING. EVEN THE FULL STOP, COMMA, PAUSE, EVERYTHING IS DIRECTLY HIS, INCLUDING THE BODY LANGUAGE. HE IS JUST USING THIS MUSCLE MEMORY, BIOMEMORY, BIOENERGY, TO MANIFEST WHAT HE WANTS TO DO. I AM VERY RESPONSIBLE FOR WHAT I AM TALKING.

*LET ME FIRST MAKE YOU ALL UNDERSTAND HOW I ADOPT AHIMSA - NONVIOLENCE - FOR RELATIONSHIP WITH ME AND WITH MY GURU, RELATIONSHIP WITH MY FIRST TEAM, WITH MY SANGHA, WITH MY DISCIPLES AND DEVOTEES, WITH PRACTISING HINDUS, WITH THE WHOLE UNIVERSE, WITH THE WHOLE HUMANITY, WITH EVERYTHING….

*IF YOU KNOW HOW I FUNCTION, YOU WILL BECOME ENLIGHTENED. KRISHNA IS THE GREATEST STRATEGIST BASED ON THE PARAMA DHARMA. FOOLS AND STUPIDS AND ANTI-HINDUS ARE THOSE WHO CLAIM KRISHNA MADE MAHABHARATA. KRISHNA PERSONALLY WENT TO NEGOTIATE PEACE AND HE WAS ABUSED. KRISHNA KNOWS HE WILL BE ABUSED, THAT MAY BE ABUSED WHEN HE GOES FOR NEGOTIATING PEACE. BUT STILL HE TOOK THE RISK. HE WAS NOT ONLY ABUSED, THERE WAS MURDER ATTEMPT ON KRISHNA.

Read More Details at: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/3836924619728693

REFERENCES: 
1. AMERICAN DOCUMENTARY https://youtu.be/G8HenR5-lkM TO SEE HOW YOU ARE BEING CONTROLLED BY MEDIA AND ENTERTAINMENT CULT.

2. We often believe that exacting revenge is a form of emotional release and that getting retribution will help us feel better. Movies often portray the act of revenge as a way of gaining closure after a wrong. But in fact, revenge has the opposite effect.  https://www.scienceofpeople.com/the-psychology-of-revenge/
